title: TOP WRAP 15 Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault
content:
1. TOP WRAP 15 Russia seizes Europe's biggest nuclear plant in 'reckless' assault  Reuters.com
  2. Russia condemned for 'reckless' nuclear plant attack  CNN
  3. Ukraine nuclear authority gives update on Zaporizhzhia power plant: now in Russian hands  Fox News
  4. WATCH: View of Kyiv skyline as Ukraine enters second week of war against Russian forces  Washington Post
  5. The Ukrainian nuclear operator says management at the seized plant is "working at gunpoint"  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
